turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a coffee drink in Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I apologize, can you repeat that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I apologize, can you repeat that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Could you repeat what you said?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat it for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Please repeat what you just said

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat, what did you say?
